011df9f23a66603ea96c2bea79e60397feec346a.query: SELECT domain.name, organisation_domain.id, organisation_domain.domain_type, organisation_domain.is_verified as `is_verified: bool` FROM domain INNER JOIN organisation_domain ON organisation_domain.id = domain.id INNER JOIN resource ON domain.id = resource.id WHERE resource.owner_id = ?;

03c361d86a523b9340c0b4516f802b04c3ac59f7.query: ALTER TABLE organisation ADD CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY(id) REFERENCES resource(id);

06d91bd00423f858a2a00607b4de6f84deaec730.query: SELECT domain.name, organisation_domain.id, organisation_domain.domain_type, organisation_domain.is_verified as `is_verified: bool` FROM organisation_domain INNER JOIN domain ON domain.id = organisation_domain.id WHERE domain.id = ?;

18dab6bbd5dd9236b9cd5ef0c6ebabfb547b5766.query: SELECT id, name, super_admin_id, active as `active: bool`, created FROM organisation WHERE id = ?;

19985f2d68f445f815d54b09c7ce3137489c6b9b.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS organisation_user ( user_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, organisation_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, role_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(user_id, organisation_id, role_id), FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user(id), FOREIGN KEY(organisation_id) REFERENCES organisation(id), FOREIGN KEY(role_id) REFERENCES role(id) );

1a16c0f33f230f7a4f3f677f2dd9ccbcbeef13f8.query: SELECT user_unverified_personal_email.* FROM user_unverified_personal_email INNER JOIN domain ON domain.id = user_unverified_personal_email.domain_id WHERE user_id = ? AND CONCAT(local, '@', domain.name) = ?;

1c2ff6984341d1fa4a1613766133cbef384baedd.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS password_reset_request ( user_id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, token TEXT NOT NULL, token_expiry BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user(id) );

1db8bafdde3f2fa4402ed243659f68717f978435.query: ALTER TABLE application ADD CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY(id) REFERENCES resource(id);

228e6bc3a8eb9c3113acda6e4fa32f347b99cf44.query: SELECT * FROM meta_data WHERE id = 'version_major' OR id = 'version_minor' OR id = 'version_patch';

23842286e5e76685178fe086624b3afa5206535e.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS role ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(500), owner_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, UNIQUE(name, owner_id), FOREIGN KEY(owner_id) REFERENCES organisation(id) );

2590c16cb786aee708555231245bcf77f707d735.query: INSERT INTO user_to_sign_up VALUES ( ?, 'organisation', ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE account_type = 'organisation', password = ?, first_name = ?, last_name = ?, backup_email_local = ?, backup_email_domain_id = ?, backup_phone_country_code = ?, backup_phone_number = ?, org_email_local = ?, org_domain_name = ?, organisation_name = ?, otp_hash = ?, otp_expiry = ?;

32b30194b7c8a2630470eba3330fdcdd184c011f.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS application_version ( application_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, version VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(application_id, version), FOREIGN KEY(application_id) REFERENCES application(id) );

371d5aa97e791ac2ea5007444c5383183135698e.query: SELECT * FROM role_permissions_resource INNER JOIN permission ON role_permissions_resource.permission_id = permission.id WHERE role_permissions_resource.role_id = ?;

3c563cf15443d3f27bff42bf8056a023ae71280c.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS meta_data ( id VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY, value TEXT NOT NULL );

3e9c3969fef4dbd846ee2e9e5f0c572737f1d8df.query: SELECT * FROM organisation_user WHERE user_id = ? ORDER BY organisation_id;

45597f9b8e3d821096f2e4e26a496155ddb1bb23.query: UPDATE user SET password = ? WHERE id = ?;

4f6e7535ab071b0910a06269bc76554944972947.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS role_permissions_resource ( role_id BINARY(16), permission_id BINARY(16), resource_id BINARY(16), PRIMARY KEY(role_id, permission_id, resource_id), FOREIGN KEY(role_id) REFERENCES role(id), FOREIGN KEY(permission_id) REFERENCES permission(id), FOREIGN KEY(resource_id) REFERENCES resource(id) );

503b68f8d7eac57d8d17737224194aa778b56ccb.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS organisation_email ( user_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, local VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, domain_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(local, domain_id), FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user(id), FOREIGN KEY(domain_id) REFERENCES organisation_domain(id) );

508d1c7bdf5baf09363b5c04c7e59d9569c44297.query: UPDATE organisation_domain SET is_verified = FALSE WHERE id = ?;

572ee1bc7c428de24baeecc05146b31607bac739.query: UPDATE user_login SET token_expiry = ?, last_activity = ? WHERE login_id = ?;

5bbdf6d1f9fa1a9fd269af05f67192c4d3b7a1b5.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_phone_number ( user_id BINARY(16), country_code CHAR(2) NOT NULL, number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(country_code, number), FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user(id), FOREIGN KEY(country_code) REFERENCES phone_number_country_code(country_code), CONSTRAINT CHECK ( LENGTH(number) >= 7 AND LENGTH(number) <= 15 AND CAST(number AS UNSIGNED) != 0 ) );

5cd0a78fcf69ed853bc49d1efd8afa8cabc699d0.query: ALTER TABLE domain ADD CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY(id) REFERENCES resource(id);

62d7ad3fba535207bbfae8092d29fe16b340fd3a.query: UPDATE user_phone_number SET user_id = ? WHERE country_code = ? AND number = ?;

63e41055c49bcc16c270cc4dd906c4a1f2c01762.query: SELECT * FROM role_permissions_resource_type INNER JOIN permission ON role_permissions_resource_type.permission_id = permission.id WHERE role_permissions_resource_type.role_id = ?;

64b74cd527d15c37d142424ba7b93bbabb4d036d.query: SELECT domain.name, organisation_domain.id, organisation_domain.domain_type, organisation_domain.is_verified as `is_verified: bool` FROM organisation_domain INNER JOIN domain ON domain.id = organisation_domain.id WHERE is_verified = FALSE;

67a053d423aed30932aa9d3714e3fb8735f3ae19.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password TEXT NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, dob BIGINT UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, bio VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, location VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, created BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, /* Recovery options */ backup_email_local VARCHAR(64), backup_email_domain_id BINARY(16), backup_phone_country_code CHAR(2), backup_phone_number VARCHAR(15), UNIQUE(backup_email_local, backup_email_domain_id), UNIQUE(backup_phone_country_code, backup_phone_number), CONSTRAINT CHECK ( ( backup_email_local IS NOT NULL AND backup_email_domain_id IS NOT NULL ) OR ( backup_phone_country_code IS NOT NULL AND backup_phone_number IS NOT NULL ) ) );

69de1faf28c994e01dd5351bc56d21980caeabf5.query: INSERT INTO user_to_sign_up VALUES ( ?, 'personal', ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, NULL, NULL, NULL, ?, ? ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE account_type = 'personal', password = ?, first_name = ?, last_name = ?, backup_email_local = ?, backup_email_domain_id = ?, backup_phone_country_code = ?, backup_phone_number = ?, org_email_local = NULL, org_domain_name = NULL, organisation_name = NULL, otp_hash = ?, otp_expiry = ?;

6a7bd45e3c86a4823d26ceb91f49ce5780a5f315.query: SELECT domain.name, organisation_domain.id, organisation_domain.domain_type, organisation_domain.is_verified as `is_verified: bool` FROM organisation_domain INNER JOIN domain ON domain.id = organisation_domain.id WHERE is_verified = TRUE;

6fa2444bb63e13a9590e092c01ba865ce21d7b2c.query: UPDATE organisation SET name = ? WHERE id = ?;

6fca493e0ba449480e3a101e7ef9ef2367df7fa4.query: SELECT user.* FROM user LEFT JOIN personal_email ON personal_email.user_id = user.id LEFT JOIN organisation_email ON organisation_email.user_id = user.id LEFT JOIN domain ON domain.id = personal_email.domain_id OR domain.id = organisation_email.domain_id WHERE CONCAT(personal_email.local, '@', domain.name) = ? OR CONCAT(organisation_email.local, '@', domain.name) = ?;

74552dd3887b7800f00b007dbd6b8362d041a7d0.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS application_version_platform ( application_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, version VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, platform VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(application_id, version, platform), FOREIGN KEY(application_id, version) REFERENCES application_version(application_id, version) );

7b3de69304ed8779f0f64bbc10dab57e4d1f4d35.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS organisation_domain ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, domain_type ENUM('personal', 'organisation') NOT NULL, is_verified BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, FOREIGN KEY(id, domain_type) REFERENCES domain(id, type), CONSTRAINT CHECK(domain_type = 'organisation') );

8a8bbee60fc109098b0ac29824b8f6b0a9195927.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS role_permissions_resource_type ( role_id BINARY(16), permission_id BINARY(16), resource_type_id BINARY(16), PRIMARY KEY(role_id, permission_id, resource_type_id), FOREIGN KEY(role_id) REFERENCES role(id), FOREIGN KEY(permission_id) REFERENCES permission(id), FOREIGN KEY(resource_type_id) REFERENCES resource_type(id) );

8ab6e7092b8a786a1077dea5c1bbc73ceac95254.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS organisation ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, super_admin_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, active BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, created BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(super_admin_id) REFERENCES user(id) );

8fee7fead10d3e69fa9fe7b210526b7ddd79d9b1.query: ALTER TABLE user ADD CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY ( backup_email_local, backup_email_domain_id ) REFERENCES personal_email ( local, domain_id );

92b3f791e9aa52a16fdd721291d03093f23c67e7.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS application ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL );

959f1a05f930ca62e96b2d9e40c8d62b3caffd55.query: SELECT user.*, domain.name FROM organisation_domain INNER JOIN domain ON domain.id = organisation_domain.id INNER JOIN resource ON organisation_domain.id = resource.id INNER JOIN organisation ON resource.owner_id = organisation.id INNER JOIN user ON organisation.super_admin_id = user.id WHERE organisation_domain.id = ?;

9a1173498fefca13bf7b4e882355adfec614c2f5.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS phone_number_country_code ( country_code VARCHAR(2) PRIMARY KEY, phone_code VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, country_name VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL );

9b8866cce443c5d16f545cb9180df5ed620726db.query: SELECT resource_type.* FROM resource_type INNER JOIN resource ON resource.resource_type_id = resource_type.id WHERE resource.id = ?;

9e64d943444bf4d584f19bcb5fc0446a3ee8a7a2.query: INSERT INTO user VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, NULL, NULL, NULL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? );

a0d117b90884a00fa6cfffcf4748bddbb49c78de.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_to_sign_up ( username VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY, account_type ENUM('personal', 'organisation') NOT NULL, password TEXT NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, /* Personal email address OR backup email */ backup_email_local VARCHAR(64), backup_email_domain_id BINARY(16), backup_phone_country_code CHAR(2), backup_phone_number VARCHAR(15), /* Organisation email address */ org_email_local VARCHAR(64), org_domain_name VARCHAR(100), organisation_name VARCHAR(100), otp_hash TEXT NOT NULL, otp_expiry BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(backup_email_domain_id) REFERENCES personal_domain(id), CONSTRAINT CHECK ( ( account_type = 'personal' AND ( org_email_local IS NULL AND org_domain_name IS NULL AND organisation_name IS NULL ) ) OR ( account_type = 'organisation' AND ( org_email_local IS NOT NULL AND org_domain_name IS NOT NULL AND organisation_name IS NOT NULL ) ) ), CONSTRAINT CHECK ( ( backup_email_local IS NOT NULL AND backup_email_domain_id IS NOT NULL ) OR ( backup_phone_country_code IS NOT NULL AND backup_phone_number IS NOT NULL ) ) );

a0fcc5906bd25566d4fed9acedce387ab7493978.query: ALTER TABLE user ADD CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY ( backup_phone_country_code, backup_phone_number ) REFERENCES user_phone_number ( country_code, number );

aaa0833fdfb215a672b9397f2ae2c1461730f452.query: SELECT user.* FROM user LEFT JOIN personal_email ON personal_email.user_id = user.id LEFT JOIN organisation_email ON organisation_email.user_id = user.id LEFT JOIN domain ON domain.id = personal_email.domain_id OR domain.id = organisation_email.domain_id WHERE user.username = ? OR CONCAT(personal_email.local, '@', domain.name) = ? OR CONCAT(organisation_email.local, '@', domain.name) = ?;

abc73c01e06ecb0567f992fdf42fd74fcdb9e084.query: SELECT id, name, resource_type_id, owner_id as `owner_id!` FROM resource WHERE id = ?;

b22bf7afe931999f3a2d5f2dea8c8900de234cb5.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS domain ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, type ENUM('personal', 'organisation') NOT NULL, KEY(id, type) );

b37436a94bc6c50a821c0ab0b04266208194734a.query: ALTER TABLE portus_tunnel ADD CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY(id) REFERENCES resource(id);

b4c820ff2d62e53e06aab6bc0098b8524e0a6293.query: SELECT domain.name, personal_domain.* FROM personal_domain INNER JOIN domain ON domain.id = personal_domain.id WHERE domain.id = ?;

b7b665b9b9844c24322f7a1153d86945a7380c40.query: SELECT id, name, super_admin_id, active as `active: bool`, created FROM organisation WHERE name = ?;

b99d59757cb2e230e61e53822265101e37988084.query: UPDATE organisation_domain SET is_verified = TRUE WHERE id = ?;

bac04b47777bccc88ced8cdb296aae251094b36c.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_login ( login_id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, refresh_token TEXT NOT NULL, token_expiry BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, user_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, last_login BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, last_activity BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user(id) );

c057024a48f7f44b924ee20c14458f43b5798ab1.query: INSERT INTO password_reset_request VALUES (?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE token = ?, token_expiry = ?;

c05f2b360a302d1b3fe52bb37e80a8bc57e2618c.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS resource_type ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(500) );

c17956975120eb16610769089719b6299bca9d50.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS personal_domain ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, domain_type ENUM('personal', 'organisation') NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(id, domain_type) REFERENCES domain(id, type), CONSTRAINT CHECK(domain_type = 'personal') );

c945d82b570986348540507d4588925089baedd7.query: INSERT INTO meta_data VALUES ('version_major', ?), ('version_minor', ?), ('version_patch', ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE value = VALUES(value);

ca81844373fa9941691d926a125d282680f84008.query: UPDATE resource SET owner_id = ? WHERE id = ?;

cd8c5c626ace529045a54e548d3febf00e74728e.query: SELECT DISTINCT organisation.id, organisation.name, organisation.super_admin_id, organisation.active as `active: bool`, organisation.created FROM organisation LEFT JOIN organisation_user ON organisation.id = organisation_user.organisation_id WHERE organisation.super_admin_id = ? OR organisation_user.user_id = ?;

cf24f2080b2b8c4307e1a25ce24cd1a359e68a3f.query: SELECT user.* FROM user INNER JOIN user_phone_number ON user.id = user_phone_number.user_id INNER JOIN phone_number_country_code ON user_phone_number.country_code = phone_number_country_code.country_code WHERE CONCAT( '+', phone_number_country_code.phone_code, user_phone_number.number ) = ?;

d334dbe26b7ab3688b0cf565d4a2542516a1d768.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS file ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL );

d85b169f94a97d1e8ab470deb5373e31723fa1dd.query: SELECT application_id, version FROM application_version WHERE application_id = ?;

e23aa701eee9f9caeebf736e1cdc6cde9ea42a08.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS portus_tunnel ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, ssh_port SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, exposed_port SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, created BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL );

e53bd14d5797f2615c52332c8825324a7f26df4f.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS permission ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(500) );

e6ca3a70fe08bad0f61d4f84b1f83d651912dd17.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS resource ( id BINARY(16) PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, resource_type_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, owner_id BINARY(16), FOREIGN KEY(owner_id) REFERENCES organisation(id), FOREIGN KEY(resource_type_id) REFERENCES resource_type(id) );

e83739abb01613cb8634c2b2d66abdd719c0e5c4.query: UPDATE personal_email SET user_id = ? WHERE local = ? AND domain_id = ?;

eae8e05ac1d52b813beb52611f862b88e717506f.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS personal_email ( user_id BINARY(16), local VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, domain_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(local, domain_id), FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user(id), FOREIGN KEY(domain_id) REFERENCES personal_domain(id) );

eca653429eddbfe6a41f012b9fad4d53554ae7b7.query: SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT 1;

edddc427c2d59da76499dd64cc93166619332951.query: ALTER TABLE file ADD CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY(id) REFERENCES resource(id);

f2fb8a826a196b0b60e4416a1a1ce224a22b0573.query: INSERT INTO user_unverified_personal_email VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id = ?, verification_token_hash = ?, verification_token_expiry = ?;

f47de2a076e82c03818b6aba24bc85480d343e70.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_unverified_personal_email ( local VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, domain_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, user_id BINARY(16) NOT NULL, verification_token_hash TEXT NOT NULL, verification_token_expiry BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(local, domain_id), FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user(id), FOREIGN KEY(domain_id) REFERENCES personal_domain(id) );

f57e5719d61530f8066baef69b1170d122e028a8.query: SELECT * FROM portus_tunnel WHERE ssh_port = ? OR exposed_port = ?;

fd5013df5bb3d03308f709b021942aeecfe58182.query: SELECT portus_tunnel.* FROM portus_tunnel INNER JOIN resource ON resource.id = portus_tunnel.id WHERE resource.owner_id = ?;
